lines:
And as I am entending to 
Attend the Students Conference 
which requere certain amount 
of expenses, 2 with you 
will be Keel engage enough 
to send me fepty dollars. 
As soon as your conven 
Allows you. With beat

Wishes

faun semel,

8. 6. Luk
raw: And as I am entending to Attend the Students Conference which requere certain amount of expenses, 2 with you will be Keel engage enough to send me fepty dollars. As soon as your conven Allows you. With beat Wishes faun semel, 8. 6. Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter from Sung Sing Kwan stating that because he took classes in English and mathematics in Boston with private tutors, his finances are depleted. He requests $50 for expenses for the conference.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
